name: Sanguozhi: Chibi zhi Zhan
overview: Sanguozhi: Chibi zhi Zhan is a beat ‘em up game for the Nintendo Famicom. It is the Famicom version of the Arcade game “Warriors of Fate”. The game is based off of the famous Chinese history based novel “Romance of the Three Kingdoms”. You can play as one of three generals whose mission is to stop the evil Cao Cao and his army.
